alert.note: Alert for South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Bay and southern Walton Counties through 1045 PM EDT/945 PM CDT/... At 958 PM EDT/858 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eglin Air Force Base, or 10 miles north of Santa Rosa Beach, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Portland, Villa Tasso, Seminole Hills, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Rock Hill, Sunnyside, Gulf Pines, Knox Hill, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Sandestin, Four Mile Village, Red Bay, Inlet Beach, Port Washington and Miramar Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
